propList.Name: afterClose
propList.Description: Specify a function that will be called when modal is closed completely

propList.Name: bodyStyle
propList.Description: Body style for modal body element. Such as height, padding etc

propList.Name: cancelButtonProps
propList.Description: The cancel button props

propList.Name: cancelText
propList.Description: Text of the Cancel button

propList.Name: centered
propList.Description: Centered Modal

propList.Name: closable
propList.Description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the modal dialog or not

propList.Name: closeIcon
propList.Description: Custom close icon

propList.Name: confirmLoading
propList.Description: Whether to apply loading visual effect for OK button or not

propList.Name: destroyOnClose
propList.Description: Whether to unmount child components on onClose

propList.Name: focusTriggerAfterClose
propList.Description: Whether need to focus trigger element after dialog is closed

propList.Name: footer
propList.Description: Footer content, set as footer={null} when you don't need default buttons

propList.Name: forceRender
propList.Description: Force render Modal

propList.Name: getContainer
propList.Description: Return the mount node for Modal

propList.Name: keyboard
propList.Description: Whether support press esc to close

propList.Name: mask
propList.Description: Whether show mask or not

propList.Name: maskClosable
propList.Description: Whether to close the modal dialog when the mask (area outside the modal) is clicked

propList.Name: maskStyle
propList.Description: Style for modal's mask element

propList.Name: modalRender
propList.Description: Custom modal content render

propList.Name: okButtonProps
propList.Description: The ok button props

propList.Name: okText
propList.Description: Text of the OK button

propList.Name: okType
propList.Description: Button type of the OK button

propList.Name: style
propList.Description: Style of floating layer, typically used at least for adjusting the position

propList.Name: title
propList.Description: The modal dialog's title

propList.Name: visible
propList.Description: Whether the modal dialog is visible or not

propList.Name: width
propList.Description: Width of the modal dialog

propList.Name: wrapClassName
propList.Description: The class name of the container of the modal dialog

propList.Name: zIndex
propList.Description: The z-index of the Modal

propList.Name: onCancel
propList.Description: Specify a function that will be called when a user clicks mask, close button on top right or Cancel button

propList.Name: onOk
propList.Description: Specify a function that will be called when a user clicks the OK button
